title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Tue Apr 3, 2018 | 8:30am   
  1 / 24 
Villanova Wildcats guard Donte DiVincenzo holds the national championship trophy with Jalen Brunson after defeating the Michigan Wolverines 79-62 in the championship game of the 2018 men's Final Four. Robert Deutsch-USA TODAY Sports   Villanova Wildcats guard Donte DiVincenzo holds the national championship trophy with Jalen Brunson after defeating the Michigan Wolverines 79-62 in the championship game of the 2018 men's Final Four. Robert Deutsch-USA TODAY Sports Close 2 / 24 
President Trump appears on the South Portico of the White House with the Easter Bunny standing behind him as the annual White House Easter Egg Roll is held on the South Lawn of the White House. REUTERS/Carlos Barria Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 President Trump appears on the South Portico of the White House with the Easter Bunny standing behind him as the annual White House Easter Egg Roll is held on the South Lawn of the White House. REUTERS/Carlos Barria Close 3 / 24 
Passengers walk along a platform carrying luggage at a railway station in New Delhi, India. REUTERS/Saumya Khandelwal   Passengers walk along a platform carrying luggage at a railway station in New Delhi, India. REUTERS/Saumya Khandelwal Close 4 / 24 
Actor and comedian Bill Cosby exits following jury selection for his sexual assault trial at the Montgomery County Courthouse in Norristown, Pennsylvania. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 Actor and comedian Bill Cosby exits following jury selection for his sexual assault trial at the Montgomery County Courthouse in Norristown, Pennsylvania. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Close 5 / 24 
A member of Syrian forces of President Bashar al Assad stands guard near destroyed buildings in Jobar, eastern Ghouta, in Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Omar Sanadiki Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 A member of Syrian forces of President Bashar al Assad stands guard near destroyed buildings in Jobar, eastern Ghouta, in Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Omar Sanadiki Close 6 / 24 
Ethan Couch closes the door to a vehicle that was waiting for him after being released from the Tarrant County Jail in Fort Worth, Texas. REUTERS/Nick Oxford Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 Ethan Couch closes the door to a vehicle that was waiting for him after being released from the Tarrant County Jail in Fort Worth, Texas. REUTERS/Nick Oxford Close 7 / 24 
Jewish worshippers wrapped in prayer shawls participate in the priestly blessing prayer on the holiday of Passover, at the Western Wall in Jerusalem's Old City. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 Jewish worshippers wrapped in prayer shawls participate in the priestly blessing prayer on the holiday of Passover, at the Western Wall in Jerusalem's Old City. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Close 8 / 24 
A boy waves a Palestinian flag, at the Israel-Gaza border, during clashes with Israeli troops, at a protest where Palestinians demand the right to return to their homeland, east of Gaza City. REUTERS/Mohammed Salem Reuters / Sunday, April 01, 2018 A boy waves a Palestinian flag, at the Israel-Gaza border, during clashes with Israeli troops, at a protest where Palestinians demand the right to return to their homeland, east of Gaza City. REUTERS/Mohammed Salem Close 9 / 24 
Newly hired employees of Japan Airlines (JAL) group fly paper planes during the company group's initiation ceremony at a hangar of Haneda airport in Tokyo. REUTERS/Issei Kato Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 Newly hired employees of Japan Airlines (JAL) group fly paper planes during the company group's initiation ceremony at a hangar of Haneda airport in Tokyo. REUTERS/Issei Kato Close 
People film a shower of cherry blossoms at a park in Tokyo, Japan. REUTERS/Toru Hanai Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 People film a shower of cherry blossoms at a park in Tokyo, Japan. REUTERS/Toru Hanai Close 11 / 24 
A man reacts as dead bodies are brought to a hospital after a suspected Boko Haram attack on the edge of Maiduguri's inner city, Nigeria. REUTERS/Ahmed Kingimi Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 A man reacts as dead bodies are brought to a hospital after a suspected Boko Haram attack on the edge of Maiduguri's inner city, Nigeria. REUTERS/Ahmed Kingimi Close 12 / 24 
A labourer speaks on his mobile phone as he takes rest in front of idols of Hindu deities which are kept under a tree at a market area in Kolkata, India. REUTERS/Rupak De Chowdhuri Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 A labourer speaks on his mobile phone as he takes rest in front of idols of Hindu deities which are kept under a tree at a market area in Kolkata, India. REUTERS/Rupak De Chowdhuri Close 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un poses with South Korean K-pop singers. KCNA/via Reuters Reuters / Sunday, April 01, 2018 North Korean leader Kim Jong Un poses with South Korean K-pop singers. KCNA/via Reuters Close 14 / 24 
Tiger Woods of the U.S. puts his finger in the air and golf patrons react after he chipped the ball into the hole on the second green during practice for the 2018 Masters golf tournament at Augusta National Golf Club in Augusta, Georgia.... more Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 Tiger Woods of the U.S. puts his finger in the air and golf patrons react after he chipped the ball into the hole on the second green during practice for the 2018 Masters golf tournament at Augusta National Golf Club in Augusta, Georgia. REUTERS/Brian Snyder Close 15 / 24 
A forensic investigator enters a house   A forensic investigator enters a house   16 / 24 
A diver performs a handstand on the ten-metre platform during a training session ahead of the Commonwealth Games on the Gold Coast, Australia. REUTERS/David Gray   diver performs a handstand on the ten-metre platform during a training session ahead of the Commonwealth Games on the Gold Coast, Australia. REUTERS/David Gray Close 17 / 24 
A boy looks on as he attends a demonstration by woman loyal to the Houthi movement against an alleged rape of a Yemeni woman by a coalition soldier, in Sanaa, Yemen. REUTERS/Khaled Abdullah Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 A boy looks on as he attends a demonstration by woman loyal to the Houthi movement against an alleged rape of a Yemeni woman by a coalition soldier, in Sanaa, Yemen. REUTERS/Khaled Abdullah Close 18 / 24 
A child raises his hands while sledding during snowfall at Brooklyn Bridge Park in New York. REUTERS/Shannon Stapleton Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 A child raises his hands while sledding during snowfall at Brooklyn Bridge Park in New York. REUTERS/Shannon Stapleton Close 19 / 24 
Teodoro Campos, opposition lawmaker and security chief of Venezuelan presidential candidate Henri Falcon, receives help after sustaining injury during a rally with Falcon, in Caracas, Venezuela. REUTERS/Rayner Pena Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 Teodoro Campos, opposition lawmaker and security chief of Venezuelan presidential candidate Henri Falcon, receives help after sustaining injury during a rally with Falcon, in Caracas, Venezuela. REUTERS/Rayner Pena Close 20 / 24 
A member of Syrian forces of President Bashar al Assad walks inside a tunnel that was used by rebels in Jobar, eastern Ghouta, in Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Omar Sanadiki Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 A member of Syrian forces of President Bashar al Assad walks inside a tunnel that was used by rebels in Jobar, eastern Ghouta, in Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Omar Sanadiki Close 
Participants take part in the annual Easter Parade and Bonnet Festival in Manhattan. REUTERS/Gaia Squarci Reuters / Sunday, April 01, 2018 Participants take part in the annual Easter Parade and Bonnet Festival in Manhattan. REUTERS/Gaia Squarci Close 22 / 24 
A view shows a damaged mail delivery drone, which crashed into a building, shortly after a test launch, part of the Russian Post�s project to deliver mail to remote regions by drone, in Ulan-Ude, the capital city of the Republic of Buryatia, Russia.... more Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 A view shows a damaged mail delivery drone, which crashed into a building, shortly after a test launch, part of the Russian Post�s project to deliver mail to remote regions by drone, in Ulan-Ude, the capital city of the Republic of Buryatia, Russia. REUTERS/Anna Ogorodnik Close 23 / 24 
An Ultra-Orthodox Jewish man prays after sunset, along the shore of the Mediterranean Sea in Ashkelon, Israel. REUTERS/Amir Cohen Reuters / Monday, April 02, 2018 An Ultra-Orthodox Jewish man prays after sunset, along the shore of the Mediterranean Sea in Ashkelon, Israel. REUTERS/Amir Cohen Close
